decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Proposed  Floor Plan and Side Elevation drawing no.301 Sheet 001  Revised Plan dated 13/2/2024
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| Notwithstanding the hereby approved plans and documents listed in condition 2 above, the roof light on the side roofslope (facing no.7 Blenheim, Road) shall be of the obscure glazed and partially limited openable (to allow for ventilation only) and shall be retained as such thereafter.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy DAA of Ealing's local Plan (Reg.18), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023) (Updated) - section 12.
description: Installation of a roof light to west side roof slope (Retrospective)
